name: Paldium Clump
description: Crystals of PAL crystal

name: Paldium Fragment
description:
Crystallized energy from the World Tree.
Capable of creating supernatural items and structures.

name: Bread
description:
Pan made from baked Flour.
A tasty staple food.

name: Pancake
description: A dish baked by mixing Flour and Milk. It progressively decreases the rate at which one's sanity decreases when eaten.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description:
A pickaxe used for mining.
Made from stone, the efficiency is questionable.

name: Metal Pickaxe
description:
A pickaxe used for mining.
Made from metal, the durability and efficiency have improved.

name: Refined Metal Pickaxe
description:
A pickaxe used for mining.
Its durability and sharpness have increased even more.

name: Pizza
description: A dish made by piling Berries, Tomato and cheese on Pan. Eating it improves COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE by +15% temporarily.

name: Plastic
description: Plastic

name: Polymer
description:
Made from refined oil.
Required for producing various advanced items such as rifles.

name: Beautiful Flower
description:
A plant that blooms colorful flowers.
Can be used to make Opium and Narcotic.

name: Potage
description: Potage

name: PotatoSeedPotatoes
description: PotatoSeedPotatoes

name: Pump-action Shotgun
description:
A high capacity, powerful shotgun.
It has outstanding close range DPS.

name: Pump-action Shotgun
description:
A high capacity, powerful shotgun.
It has outstanding close range DPS.

name: Pump-action Shotgun
description:
A high capacity, powerful shotgun.
It has outstanding close range DPS.

name: Pump-action Shotgun
description:
A high capacity, powerful shotgun.
It has outstanding close range DPS.

name: Pump-action Shotgun
description:
A high capacity, powerful shotgun.
It has outstanding close range DPS.

name: Pure Quartz
description:
Quartz often found in snowy fields and similar places.
Required to create MachineParts2.

name: Lifmunk Effigy
description:
A mysterious Pal statue that can be found all around Palpagos Island.
Players can enhance their abilities by making offerings to certain statues.

name: Repair Kit
description:
Tools for repairing structures.
Use it on destroyed structures to repair them.

name: Rifle Ammo
description: Bullets used in rifles and similar firearms.

name: Coarse Ammo
description: Ammo for Musket, MakeshiftHandgun, and other similar weapons.

name: Ruby
description:
A gemstone that glows red.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Salad
description: A Salad made by mixing Lettuce and Tomato. When consumed, it temporarily grants COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK +15%, COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE -5%.

name: Sandwich
description: Sandwich

name: Sapphire
description:
A gemstone that glows blue.
Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

name: Seafood Soup
description: Seafood Soup

name: Common Shield
description:
A curious shield that was made using Paldium technology.
It repairs itself automatically when not taking damage after some time.

name: Mega Shield
description:
A curious shield that was made using Paldium technology.
It repairs itself automatically when not taking damage after some time.
As a mass produced model, defenses have been enhanced.

name: Giga Shield
description:
A curious shield that was made using Paldium technology.
It repairs itself automatically when not taking damage after some time.
Modifications have increased its effectiveness even further.

name: Hyper Shield
description:
A curious shield that was made using Paldium technology.
It repairs itself automatically when not taking damage after some time.
Repeated testing has created a near perfect product.

name: Shotgun Shells
description: Bullets used in shotguns and similar firearms.

name: Silicon
description: en Text

name: Single-shot Rifle
description:
A single-shot rifle.
What it lacks in capacity, it makes up for with sheer power.
